unnormalised: Mumbai: Finding your dream home in the City of Dreams just got a little easier! Forget blindly trusting brochures; "Builder Reviews," a new trend, is empowering homebuyers like never before.
normalised: Mumbai: Finding your dream home in the City of Dreams just got a little easier! Forget blindly trusting brochures; "Builder Reviews," a new trend, is empowering homebuyers like never before.

unnormalised: Imagine getting firsthand accounts from folks like Mrs. Sharma from Bandra about her experience with 'Shanti Developers' – no more hidden surprises! These online platforms allow residents to share their feedback on everything from construction quality to promised amenities.
normalised: Imagine getting firsthand accounts from folks like Missus Sharma from Bandra about her experience with 'Shanti Developers' – no more hidden surprises! These online platforms allow residents to share their feedback on everything from construction quality to promised amenities.

unnormalised: "It's like asking your chachi about which goldsmith makes the best bangles," explains Rohan Verma, a techie from IIT-Delhi, and one of the early adopters. "Genuine reviews about carpet area, (Rs.) maintenance charges and even parking woes become easily accessible."
normalised: "It's like asking your chachi about which goldsmith makes the best bangles," explains Rohan Verma, a techie from I I T-Delhi, and one of the early adopters. "Genuine reviews about carpet area, rupee maintenance charges and even parking woes become easily accessible."

unnormalised: One review pointed out delays of over 6 months in a Kalyan project, while another praised a builder for delivering a flat 1000 sq ft as promised, near Powai Lake.
normalised: One review pointed out delays of over six months in a Kalyan project, while another praised a builder for delivering a flat one thousand square feet as promised, near Powai Lake.

unnormalised: Experts believe this trend will bring much-needed transparency to the real estate sector, forcing builders to prioritize customer satisfaction. Even Dr. Patil, a noted real estate analyst, feels this could curb unscrupulous practices. So, before you book that flat, do your homework! Check out those builder reviews!
normalised: Experts believe this trend will bring much-needed transparency to the real estate sector, forcing builders to prioritize customer satisfaction. Even Doctor Patil, a noted real estate analyst, feels this could curb unscrupulous practices. So, before you book that flat, do your homework! Check out those builder reviews!
